laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic, smooth contour, no focal liver mass, main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow, no ascites. Bile ducts: no intrahepatic biliary dilation, CHD measures 5 mm. Gallbladder filled with sludge and stones which are mobile. Pancreas not well visualized. Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis.
